name: Rogue Blob
description:
Green has always wanted to be a Rogue and a Thief..

Only issue is, Green is a blob! And blobs aren't natural thieves...

Can you help her prove herself!?

Controls:

Left & Right arrow keys to move

Up to jump

T to Transform

Space to swing Sword

This is my first game jam! So go easy one me!

All code and sprites were done by myself

Audio is from the following Unity packages:

8 - bit music free - by CRON AUDIO

SOUND FX - Retro Pack - by ZERO RARE (LEVI MOORE)
